title: 求助！！，为何son_of_god可以给自己*权限？
author: moline
txt_content:
[10:06:53] [Server thread/INFO]: [PLAYER_COMMAND] son_of_god: /manuaddp son_of_god *
[10:07:09] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god issued server command: /@ biny 额
这是它输入的，关键是 居然没有拒绝命令，这个ID是怎么回事？ 
求帮助

replies.author: moline
replies.txt_content:
[10:54:05] [Server thread/INFO]: §6管理员§c Console§6 封禁了 son_df_god,§6理由:登录失败!您的帐号已被此服务器封禁!
[10:54:05] [Server thread/INFO]: 警告: 这个玩家 'son_df_god' 从来没有加入过服务器.
[10:20:24] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god issued server command: /deop son_of_god
[10:20:24] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god: De-opped son_of_god
[10:20:25] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god issued server command: /fly
[10:20:26] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god issued server command: /fly
[10:20:27] [Server thread/INFO]: son_of_god issued server command: /gm 0

replies.author: 青橘短衫丶
replies.txt_content: 你删除你的ops文件重启服务器就可以
